content.detailedDescription: Me and my husband went out to smoke on our front porch. we noticed an unusal light blinking several colors randomly, it was moving left to right, i took several photos. three colors were seen green blue and white, i noticed a touch of red. we went inside for 20 minutes and came back out, it had moved to the sw and lowered it elevation by im guessing 10 feet. im unsure of how far it is from us but this is not the first time ive seen this particalur object with the same colors. i was slighty nerved by it, and told my husband to come out with me so i could photograph while he was completely calm. right now its still hovering but very slowly moving to the west. im guessing that this object is actually over vegas right now. its dimmed down quite a bit with moments of brightness. i have about seven photos
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovering light very low bright moving left to right

content.detailedDescription: We were followed by 2 ufos one small one giant we lost an hour time it was broad day light a mecury clor looking dhip it affected our truck it also left a trce which still exsist  i was then followed by mib i have had nitemares since and woke up with marks on my back sometimes the dreams i have are so real as if im taken to another planet sometimes. my daughters are now going through the same thing with nitemares although they were not with me during the sighting nut they were with me when i was being followed by an m.I.B. i was also carried by bigfoot when i was little an my mom and many familys here in nm have seen dark man although i wonder if all these encounters are in some way related .
content.summary: Ex-husband and i were on our way to lovington nm, aproaching locohills nm a mercury color looking disc appeared right next to our vehicle right outside our window as if we could almost reach out an touch it. and then we saw a mother ship. we lost time.

content.detailedDescription:
On may 18, 2014 at approx. 2035 hrs. i had exited my back porch into my yard with my dog to allow her to do her business.  i noticed an immensely bright orange/red glowing ball coming across the sky from north to south.  this object did not make any sound at all as it traversed the sky.  i immediately ran inside the house leaving the dog inside and having my wife come back outside with me.  the object was still traveling south in the sky.  i was then able to capture this object on video using my cellphone.  as i was recording this object it changed direction to travel east.  while this object was traveling east, it also seemed to diminish in intensity to the point that it appeared as a flame that is extinguished.  but, before it completely stopped glowing, it seemed to flicker on and off at least 3 times with each not having the intensity of glow that it did prior to the direction change and ascension.  it was approximately 40 seconds after this object disappeared that my wife called my attention to a second object identical to the first following the same flight line across the sky.  i once again started to video this object as the first and told my wife to retrieve our son's telescope.  she went into the house and retrieved the telescope and brought it outside to me but i was unable to get the object into focus.  by this time, the object made the same directional change to the east while ascending.  this object did not seem to diminish in the same manner as the first as it ascended higher in the sky, nor did it flicker.  this second object just seemed to vanish at a certain point while ascending higher into the sky. after we witnessed this event, i spotted an airplane over our house roof and i videotaped the airplane to show the contrast between it and the unidentified objects we observed and i videotaped.  the plane was clearly distinguishable with its blinking lights.  the unkown objects never blinked and had an intensity unlike any airplane known to us. 

this encounter is especially unnerving as well as being of major interest to my wife and i. we would very much like to know just what these objects that we had observed are.  to note, this is the second of such sightings of the same phenomenon my wife and i have observed. last summer (june 2013) while riding our motorcycle back from the supermarket, we had seen 5 of the same intensely orange/red/yellow fireballs approx. 2 miles east of our home where we saw the two last evening.  we pulled off of the road along with a few other vehicles and we watched as these five objects headed east with various speeds.  the five then at different times made very sudden and erratic direction changes that culminated with them all eventually ascending while traveling southeast.  all five objects one at a time seemed to extinguish their glow once ascending high into the sky with some abruptly extinguishing their glow and others seemingly flickering out or just fading out.  these five objects were also silent during this event.  there was also an easily identified airplane flying west of these 5 objects on that particular night.
content.summary: Two orange/red intensely glowing round objects one after the other moving accross sky just under the cloud cover with no sound.  then they made abrupt direction change, ascended and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
My son saw the first one about 850 pm and called me and the wife out from watching tv. he was hanging laundry on a line. it was a bright orange egg shaped orb or object that glowed like a sun. it went west to east to our north. altitude was steady and low moving fast and silently.  i ran in to get the camera and while inside a second orb came by and ejected a smaller version of itself which i missed. when i came out third orb appeared even closer to us and is in the attached collage. this is a time lapse and reads like a book, top left to right, then lower left to right. i couldn't get the camera working right away so these are distant zoomed shots.It was much much closer when i first walked out and was clearly not an aircraft. i was shocked as this was my first ufo sighting and it was less than 1000 feet away.

mike
content.summary: Watched fast moving orange egg shaped orb silently fly past at probably 150 miles per hour son saw it too

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to yuma, co, to go to the grocery store.  i noticed numerous chemtrails and spraying going on in the sky. i took some pictures with my cell phone.  one of the last photos i took had this light circle show up right above the chemtrails.  it was not visible with the naked eye, and it was not the sun or moon.  the picture was taken facing south approx. 7 pm on friday night, may 16, 2014.  i have no idea what it is. 
on that same night after shopping i took another picture of a jet spraying with another jet under it with no spray, disproving the contrail theory. the jet under the other jet was very unusual and looked almost black with an odd shape to it.  i have attached that picture as well.

another strange event happened to me taking pictures 2 weeks ago.  there was the most unusual cloud formations i have ever seen over the city of greeley, so i stopped to take some pictures with my cell phone.  after the first picture, my camera locked up and my scan disk got erased, and all of my pictures were erased off my camera.  some time later after i restarted my cell phone the camera started working again, but all of my gallery is gone and my scan disk was entirely erased. there was something very very odd about those clouds and of course my photo was erased!
content.summary: Taking pictures of chemtrails and this light circle orb showed up in pictures,

content.detailedDescription: It was 12:20 and i was sitting on my deck in oakville when an orb-like object appeared with a primary red light with whitish trail in the west and moved southwest silently crossing the sky then changed direction and went south until disappeared from sight.  total viewing time was at least 5 min.  it appeared to be floating and smooth movements.  i have no idea what it was, but it certainly was not a firework (victoria day weekend here), it was not an airplane or balloon or satellite, it was very close initially.  one thought it may have been a remote control toy but how could it be silent, and then move so fast much higher and going south over the lake?   i have no explanation for what this object was and decided to report it here.
content.summary: An orb-like object primary red light with whitish trail appeared silently crossing the sky then changed direction and went south until disappeared from site

content.detailedDescription: Was trying out a recently purchased "mega zoom" camera taking some photos of the moon.  this particular photo was out of focus and upon review noticed object in top left of photo.
content.summary: Accidental photo

content.detailedDescription:
I looked out my kitchen window and saw a round 40'to 60' sphere. it was flashing bright red, then light red with a yellow fire surrounding 1/3 of it. i then went outside on my deck and watched it flash more brightly, then it sped up and disappeared while traveling s to se at a high speed. it started at about 20 degrees over st. paul and disappeared over st. paul park at about 35 degrees. estimated i first viewed at 5 miles away and my
last distance to object from deck was about 1/4 mile away. total time watching 30-35 seconds. no wind, clear sky, no noise or jets seen in the area. temp 42. full moon to the south. i have been watching airplanes and the space station for years. i have seen a md-80 engine snuff out during daylight and the plane had to turn around and for landing a msp. i thought maybe a airplane had engine problems so i went out on my on the deck, to maybe call 911. this object made no noise and was very quick in the upward movement it made. while the sphere was leveling off (my best view) it faded out. the object sped at its fastest right before it faded out.
very strange colors as if the engine(?) was creating problems for the object, it was able to correct that and then the object decided to disappear? (my feelings) rw
content.summary: Fast moving burning sphere which disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were standing outside smoking (around 1015pm), and we noticed a red/orange star so we thought. well i kept telling him, it is moving very slow, it would move down and to the right. when my husband looked he said i was seeing things, but then it got very dim and small and disappeared. a few seconds later it was to the left of the star i was using to pinpoint it and was very bright and larger. we didn't understand what was happening and kept watching it. and it would all of a sudden be to the right of this star, get dim and reappear on the other side. we decided to take out binoculars to see if we could see anything (obviously we knew we couldn't) but we noticed that this red (star) had two glowing things by it that were a lot smaller then the main object. the funny thing is..This was the second night i noticed it, and the first night my husband finally believed me. during this, i was very uneasy and had a scared feeling going on, while my husband wanted to shine a flashlight at it, i told him no because i felt like whatever it was would then know we were watching it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red star thought was mars, so wrong..

content.detailedDescription: I was out last night watching a few fireworks with my kids near a building i work at and then two lights about 10 minutes apart went on a straight line path from south-west to north-east. i had my two kids with me and i said they were chinese lanterns. i took three pictures of what i could but they disappeared from my sight once they headed north-east. they were just going over slowly and then going off in the distance.
content.summary: Two orange-yellow balls of light

content.detailedDescription: Small light light stopped took pictures light start it left played and left.
content.summary: Weird but real

content.detailedDescription:
i witnessed in the sky trails of white and multiple helicopters
one after the other in conjunction with the trails 
above yeshiva university an orthodox jewish univ
content.summary: White trails and black helicopters and one red one

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were traveling home after watching a movie at our favorite theater, movies ten. we headed home on state route 78 traveling in an easterly direction. the radio was on and both windows were down about 3-4", the sky was very dark that night. we had just passed under the overpass for the new highway that was not yet open or operational at the time. suddenly i caught a quick glimpse of lights flying in a straight line across the highway in a nw direction at an very low altitude. i looked at my daughter and said "did you see that?" she replied with wide eyes "yeah" i asked "what was that?" all she said was "i don't know". i then leaned forward looking out my windshield waiting for a break in the tree cover so that maybe i might catch another glimpse of it and confirm in my mind that it was completely explainable. i got to that break but it was too late no lights, but now i am alert and watching. and suddenly the same formation of lights crossed the highway again traveling in the same nw path as the first set of lights. they were set in a triangle pattern, three large lights all set at the points and all red in color, a fourth pulsating white light set halfway and slightly forward of the two back lights, it appeared that there could have been more lights along the back edge or they could have been reflections of the red point lights, i can't be sure which it was. the distance between the lights led me to believe that the object was as large if not larger than a commercial aircraft, i do feel like it was one solid craft. i got a good look at the second set of lights and every hair on my body stood on end, i could not make out any craft edges or shape. the ufo was flying so low and i never heard any noise, i am honestly unsure if there was any radio interference, i don't remember being able to even hear the radio at that moment. my daughter was very shaken and doesn't want to talk about it. when i think about it or speak about it to someone i get the same feeling i had when i saw it the first time, all my hair stands up on end. it was honestly a life changing experience.
content.summary: Witnessed a formation of lights traveling suspiciously low crossing over my highway of travel

content.detailedDescription:
Object not visible to to the necked eye. i was taking my usual digital camera shots approximately 30 to 45 minutes after sun set. on the average i will take around 500 shots. these are usually taken 75 to 100 shots at the same angle and exposure. not ever sure if anything of interest has been captured until viewed on the computer. this particular evening was very nice and i saw nothing in the sky. but upon viewing the different frames the subject came into view on the right side, which would have been from the north-north west.
turned east toward me, then went straight up and disappeared.There are 6 digital shots showing this subject. as usual i was not effected in any way. i feel this area of north carolina has more than its share.
content.summary: Cigar type, rotating power field, appeared to be flexible

content.detailedDescription: At a lacross game. started seeing first two objects, then six more in a line, then they moved off. seemed to be spinning, flashing lights and then they all left.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We saw,(6 of us at a lacross game), 7 objects below the clouds. they appeared to be turning and moving in a line then all went separate ways. a couple stopped and were stationary for minutes then changed direction and left.

content.detailedDescription: I was building a metal building near kingsbury tx jan/feb 2006. we were installing roof panels when i noticed something hovering in the air behind two of my crew members that were already on the roof. i observed the object for several minutes while waiting on the next sheet to be pre-drilled inside the garage. when the next sheet was ready, i slide the sheet up and onto the garage roof over my head losing sight of the object. when the sheet was past my head and my line of sight was clear again, the object was gone. i honestly thought is was a us airways plane (unpainted, silver, and shiny in color) but it didn't seam to move and i couldn't see any wings, tail, or engines. it made no noise (could have been too far away) -and left no jet-stream. things i looked for as i am a retired air force jet engine mechanic and i've been around lots of aircraft. my second thought was that it was the metlife blimp but again, it just seamed to hover in place. i don't know if this is worth an investigation but i wanted to tell my story to someone besides my family.
content.summary: Observed a metallic silver, cigar/zeplin shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
Was driving west on ne killingsworth ave when my wife and i both saw a glowing flash in the sky that turned a few different colors (red, orange, blue, yellow) then disappeared. no sound or any kind of explosive concussion.

it was spherical in shape and glowing, the light from it was diffused by the clouds giving it kind of an "aura". it appeared out of nowhere and disappeared in about 5 seconds.It resembled a transformer exploding but it was too high in the sky. i should note that there were some lightning strikes in the portland area that evening, some causing power outages, but this did not look like any lightening that i've ever seen.
content.summary: Was driving west on ne killingsworth ave when my wife and i both saw a glowing flash in the sky that turned a few different colors (red, orange, blue, yellow) then disappeared. no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was 11 or 12 standing in my driveway facing the road when i noticed a strange, brightly colored object hovering (or moving very very slowly, it's hard to remember  exactly) above the trees. we lived in a very densely wooded area of new hampshire at the time, and there was nothing around that i could have mistaken it for (no signs or anything, just green nature). it was very bright red/red orange with bright yellow detailing like stripes and shapes. the surface appeared to be some sort of shiny plastic, with no sharp corners. i remember thinking it looked almost toy like. there was no sound coming from it as it moved just above the top of the trees, and then suddenly it was just gone. it was so brief that i thought i had imagined it, but i remember very distinctly those bright colors and the way it sat just a few feet from the top of the trees. i didn't really tell many people about it, because i wasn't really sure exactly what i had seen. recently, my roommate and i were trading ufo stories (i've seen other strange light anomalies as an adult, but nothing like what i saw in the 90s). he told me the story about his mother and about 20 other people witnessing a flying object matching the exact description of the object i saw. this occurred in the 1970s. i asked him to encourage his mother to file a report with mufon, so i hope she does.
content.summary: Strange brightly colored hovering object right above treeline

content.detailedDescription: The object was sighted from my yard looking northwest at about or before sunset. it was approximately jan. 3~5th of 2008. i was home alone and no one else saw it. i at first thought it was fireworks of some kind since it was so soon after new year's eve but it was the only object and there was no noise of fireworks present. the object appeared to give off light and it was bright. it was about the size of a silver dollar at arms length or larger. it was completely silent the entire time. it seemed to drift forward then down a little then as it got close to the tree tops it shot off like a rocket towards the sw towards the direction of stephenville, texas. it was gone in a blink of an eye it was so fast but still absolutely quite. sound travels out here and you can hear any planes or gunshots but there was no sound to be heard. this is a rural area and you can hear the sound of jets flying into and from fort worth and dfw airport and carswell nas. there was no air traffic heard or seen at that time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Object appeared to sort of glow. hovered, drifted down and then took off like a rocket in a sw direction. no sound. it was huge.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my father's house yesterday, and we were camping out in his backyard. me, my step mom, and my dad were sitting out by the fire we made, at eleven pm to midnight. i kept looking at the sky, hoping to see a spacecraft. looking back on it now, i'm pretty sure i've seen plenty spacecraft before, i just didn't know what they were at the time. anyways, i was looking up at the sky, and of course my step mom and my dad were looking at the fire while this happened, but i see something flying through the sky. at first i'm thinking it's an airplane, but then i noticed that first of all, it was flying much faster than an airplane, and second of all it looked nothing like one. then i was thinking: shooting star? nope, shooting stars fly much faster than that. but i noticed it when it was about north east of me in the sky, and was able to watch it until it disappeared behind trees to the west of where i was at the time. during the process i just felt like "oh, this is normal, it happens". mainly because i've been changing my mindset to recognize spacecraft as everyday objects. also for some reason, i couldn't feel excited while looking at it. i kind of felt like there was something trying to make me look away from it. afterwards i got kind of excited though and asked my parents if they believed in ufos, and they said "no" in their own ways. then i told them i just saw one fly by and they told me it was an airplane; no, i told them, it was flying too fast and looked nothing like one. they told me it was a shooting star; no, it was not that fast. it was a comet; i didn't say this next part because i didn't want to argue over it, but i was thinking "yea, because comets fly sideways all the time. *sarcasm*". plus, it was too close to be a comet; comets are comets because they are meteors that fly by outside of the earth's atmosphere. it also was not a meteorite because like i said, they don't fly sideways. not that i know of anyways. it looked either rectangular, or it was circular in the middle with a rectangular aura? not sure. all the ufo did was fly across the sky, before disappearing behind the tree line.
content.summary: Ufo flew over backyard

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog when i noticed what i thought was an an airplane with orange light. moving in a straight line north to south i didn't think anything about it and dismissed it. then i looked up again and saw another one. then i thought airplane's aren't orange, maybe it's a helicopter, but i didn't hear anything. then i saw another, i ran inside and called my husband. as he comes outside we see another. this one stops behind our house, hovers for a few seconds then the lights go off and it disappers.
content.summary: See below

content.detailedDescription: I was at the outdoor movie(drive-in) with my daughter. we were sitting on lawnchairs outside the car, when i noticed out of the corner of my eye a fairly low dark object moving through the sky. it was almost dark out(9:45 p.M. central time)  i pointed it out to my daughter and she was somewhat scared. craft appeared as a dark structured shape with more of a barely visible outline. no shape could be confirmed. i initially thought the shape was triangular, but after thinking long about it i cannot confirm. it was like a shadow that was flying. craft had no lights. craft was flying north, slightly northwest. it was kind of a hazy sky but we watched it for about 5 seconds before it was no longer visible. craft was fast but not unbelievably fast. i had a strange initial feeling as i seen it. my brain told me that is what a craft flying in the dark with no lights looks like no big deal. then a fraction of a second later i was thinking this was not normal. no sound was heard from it. a plane that size should of been heard even with the radio on outside for the movie. it was that close.
content.summary: Seen a dark structered shape flying northwest

content.detailedDescription: Was watching 2 hawks fly above house when i noticed what appeared to be a bird way above the hawks but under the clouds. there was no wing movement which i thought was strange then i noticed another one come from the northwest and turn just in front of the other and both continued south in formation. they seemed to pick up speed once the were in formation. i noticed how fast they were moving and thought it was strange. s they passed overhead i could see the entire shape. when i first saw the object it almost looked like a w flying in the air that's why i immediately thought it was a bird. once i could see the rest of the objects they appeared to be discs. i noticed no sound as passed overhead and flew in a perfectly straight line other than the 2nd one joining the first. the sky was cloudy with large clouds. the objects appeared to be just below the clouds and never disappeared into them. during the time i saw them it was sunny. i watched them until they disappeared out of sight. the entire time was 20 to 25 seconds. i have attached a rough sketch. the top one is how the object first appeared then bottom is how it looked after it went overhead
content.summary: Watching two hawks above when i noticed something above hawks but below clouds.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my apartment in downtown ottawa on may 9th 2014 and at around 9:30 the city had a fire works display at dows lake for the national day of honor for afghanistan veterans. at first my roommates and i didn't know what the sound was (it was probably echoing off the tall apartment buildings) but we were scared at first, because it sounded as if there was a fire fight in the streets. the sound was so loud it was shaking our window frames all around the apartment. our two cats hid for the majority (which personally scared me as they don't usually freak at the sound of fireworks, seeing as we live downtown and there are frequent loud noises..Cars, trucks and fireworks for festivals. not to mention that i live close to blues fest and can usually hear the entire three day event clearly and they have never freaked out as they did then.)so i decided to shut off all the lights in the apartment for fear of the building being shelled (it was that scary/loud)i then proceeded to go see what the sound was from my porch around 9:45, and as i was standing there listening to the sound i could see the entire block starting to wake up. a ton of people started turning their lights on and i started watching how other people were reacting to the sound. as i was doing that i looked at the far away buildings as a very large number of people were turning on their lights to the sounds, then a bolt of lightning lite up the sky and right above the apartment building in front of my porch i saw the lightning strike something very large hovering over one of the buildings. at first i couldn't believe what i just saw, but i didn't really get a good look at it. this object was massive in comparison to anything i have seen in the sky before. it also seemed to be extremely close to one of the radio towers that was on top of one of the apartment buildings. as  the light from the lightning dimmed i was hit with a wave of shock as i couldn't see it against the dark cloudy sky. i started to panic as i couldn't believe what i just saw. during this the sound of the fire works was still going on and rumbling my chest as if i was in a imax theatre. i waited about ten minutes; frantically searching the sky for what i saw...Then another bolt of lightning stuck the same object in the same place, but this time i got a very good look at it and saw that it was saucer shaped and spinning. i just stood there staring at the sky as the light dimmed, and then i never saw it again. i then went inside when the fireworks ended at 10:30, and sat in my living room look at the sky for most of the night.
content.summary: I saw a very large saucer get struck by lightning twice in the same place in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 1974, a friend and myself were driving along a farm road in white pine, tn. we observed a dark object, possibly triangular, hovering over us at approx. 50 feet. it had two lights, one red, one green, at opposite ends of the craft. it was dead silent. we stopped the car and exited. it was around 9pm, after dusk, and very hard to define the shape. after about 15 minutes of observation, the lights slowly moved toward each other, forming on light, and the craft slowly moved upward and north. it crossed a low hill and descended again on the other side. we followed, but once on top of the hill saw nothing. strangest thing was the silence. it made no sound at all. there was no feeling of fear, just an amazement that an object that big could hover and maneuver silently.
content.summary: Object hovered over us for about 15 minutes, red and green lights moved toward each other, then object flew away silently.

content.detailedDescription:
I bought a new olympus omd camera and went to red rock to take initial photos. nothing was visible to the eye. no aircraft in the area at the time.

the next day, upon getting home, i downloaded the photos to my laptop to get a good look at the camera quality.

the upper right-hand corner shows the object. the only reason i can come up with for it being blurry is that it was moving quite fast.

20 other photos in the same area at or around the same time show nothing like it.

i hope you have the capacity to view this image with more sensitive software than my own.
content.summary: Not visible until i got home and looked at photo on my computer.

content.detailedDescription: riding to work early morning took photo of sunrise on bike stopped bike to take photo did not realise till i showed my girlfriend later that day after she said what is that i cropped the photo i was amazed to find what seems to be a circular shaped object with a dome on top just still there
content.summary: On way to work caught on camera unaware till i examined photo that i captured this until my girlfriend noticed it stunned !

content.detailedDescription: Walking to my lady friends house when i go to hop up her stairs and i notice an orange light. i back up to inspect and i realized there were 4-5 very bright orange lights radiating if not menting. i stood there for about 2 minutes whaching. they hovered stationary, i thought at first it was mars but there were multiples and this was way bigger. all of the orbs began to kove in the same direction, maintaining the same distance and doing the same movements. i ran up the stairs got my friend told here to hurry and get out here. by the time me and her got back outside which took 15 seconds tops, all the orbs dissapered. the last light was fading out as i headed back outside. but these lights were so bright no way should they have been out of sight within that time frame. i know what planes and copters look like and flares for that matter. these lights moved together and almost seemed to follow the main lights lead systematically.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 4-5 orange radiating orbs.

content.detailedDescription:
At this point in time i was a global moderator on a website and used to work overnight to intercept and scrutinise posts coming to our forum. at the said time i decided to get some fresh air at the window in my room as i am a smoker. as i pushed open the window i leaned on the sill and just generally looked around. as i turned to my left (to the south east) i noticed this said phenomena motionless in the sky. this item was of a circular nature of jagged pulsating orange light in a frequency of approximately three to four seconds. i dismissed this as to be of a laser origin as we have a yearly air show and many lasers are used in a display in an evening party type atmosphere. i was of the opinion that this could be from someone trying out a new type of display; however the air show was months away. 
after approximately five minutes this light began to fade; as this light was fading i noticed that it was a beautiful clear star lit night/morning. i am no laser expert but it struck me as odd as a laser needs something to project on, example a cloud or a smoke generated via a smoke machine, however, with todays technology i dont know what can be achieved.

the following night/morning at approximately the same hour i witnessed the exact same phenomena only this time the colour was electric blue. once again the sky was clear of clouds; this light was a copycat of the previous night. i have a video camera which was at hand and decided to record this phenomena, however it was set to auto focus and i am aware that the camera would not operate correctly so i was trying to set the camera to manual focus but annoyingly i fumbled too long; i eventually returned to the window however the light was fading so i missed this opportunity to capture footage.

also just as a matter of interest; manymany years ago (approximately 1997)  my wife and i witnessed a star sized white object (on a clear night) moving toward us from the east at quite some speed and at a great height possibly thirty to forty thousand feet. this object came to a complete stop for a second or two then at impossible speed just flew to the north.

we reside in the north east of the uk in-between newcastle and sunderland in washington new town tyne/wear.

i hope these experiences are of some use to you. i am not a sky watcher and these experiences were by mere chance.If you would like any further information i will be more than happy to oblige.

thank you

mr j e smith.
content.summary: Pulsating jagged lights

content.detailedDescription:
It was evening, about 9 pm or so, the thursday before the local air show. late april. i went for a smoke (non-smoking apartment community). i always check out the sky and where the different planets and stars are or cloud watch. i saw one star flickering red-orange like mars but i know mars should not be in the northern sky now.(mars was southwest) i took out my phone and turned on the google sky map to see what it was (maybe an m class). as i went to point the phone in the direction of the object, it got brighter, flashed red and zoomed off with a wide bright red fire trail; it reminded me of star trek when a ship would zoom off and leave a trail of "fire". it took me by surprise. at first i thought, a plane maybe for the air show. but it was fast, no sound, took seconds to disappear and was stationary until it zoomed. 
it was not a normal jet. there were other planes high up and regular distance for approach to austin at that same time frame; two were low enough to see there white and red flashing lights going south to austin. there were 5 others in that same time frame of 9-10 pm going south but much higher in altitude so, just looked like a moving white light. this did not have the characteristics of the normal area planes. it was not like a chopper. it was fast. i am slow with the phone camera so no pic. but it was faster than i could have been. it was interesting that this one seemed like a star at first. it was much closer but i do not measure distances well,so i guess about 3 football fields up and 2 football field to the north of where i was standing.

do you ever want to hear about encounters from the 1960-70's - i have had two and time lapse.
content.summary: Night sky, star-like, red/orange flicker then zoomed off- with bright red tail
